line.text: %PLAYER%: It's incredible a jungle like this can exist in the Antarctic. It'd be interesting to study the alien equipment that makes all this possible.
line.textb: %PLAYER%: Who would have thought it'd be possible to have a jungle like this in the Antarctic? The alien equipment that protects this land must be very advanced.

line.text: %PLAYER%: But no time for that now. This was the area in which Mystique was last seen by Pyro. Let's see if we can't find the queen of mean.
line.textb: %PLAYER%: But we can search for that later. Right now, we need to focus on finding Mystique. This is the area Pyro said he followed her to. I wonder what she's up to?
